name: THE SNAKES ARE HERE!!!
description:
GREAT SNAKES! The snakes are loose and some are totally dangerous! Wrangle up the snakes, throwing the toxic snakes to the left and the non-toxic snakes to the right. You can see which snakes are toxic by pulling up your trusty field guide. But, try not to mess up, partner, three strikes, and it's game over! Hurry, the snakes are here!!!

Controls: 

Left-Arrow Key - Sort Snake to Toxic

Right-Arrow Key - Sort Snake to Non-Toxic

Down-Arrow Key - Toggle Field Guide

ESC - Return to Main Menu

Credits:

Gabriel Reid (@gabrielcreates) - 2D Artist/Video Editor

Sophia Cheon (@sophiacheon.jpg on IG) - 2D Artist/Sound Designer

Olly Glenn (@dninosores) - Programmer/Producer

Jacob Livingston - Programmer

Made in 48 hours for Husky Jam 2021
